project.name: Orion Edge Gateway
project.scope: API gateway, rate limiting, auth integration

sections.title: Introduction & Context Setting
sections.goal: Establish the interviewee's understanding of the Orion Edge Gateway project and their role in it.
sample_questions: Can you briefly describe your involvement in the Orion Edge Gateway build phase?
What are the core components and integrations you’ve been focusing on?
Which runbooks or SLAs are most relevant to your daily work here?

sections.title: Architecture & Infrastructure as Code
sections.goal: Explore the interviewee’s approach to designing and automating the gateway infrastructure.
sample_questions: How have you applied Infrastructure as Code principles to the API gateway deployment?
Can you walk me through the RB-GW-011 Rolling Deployments runbook and how you’ve automated parts of it?
What’s your strategy for managing configuration drift across environments?

sections.title: Integration with Authentication and Security Policies
sections.goal: Understand how authentication mechanisms and corporate policies are implemented within the gateway.
sample_questions: How did you integrate mTLS in compliance with POL-SEC-001?
What challenges did you face in resolving ticket GW-4821 MTLS Handshake Bug Analysis?
How do you ensure rate limiting and auth policies don’t conflict with SLA-ORI-02?

sections.title: Monitoring, Observability & Incident Response
sections.goal: Assess the candidate’s approach to observability and handling incidents.
sample_questions: What metrics and traces do you collect to ensure we meet p95 latency targets?
How do you coordinate with the Nimbus Observability team for alert tuning?
Could you describe a recent incident and the steps taken as per the runbook?

sections.title: Cross-Project Dependencies and Multi-Hop Problem Solving
sections.goal: Evaluate the interviewee’s ability to reason across subsystems and resolve complex dependencies.
sample_questions: How does Orion Edge Gateway interact with Aegis IAM for JIT access?
Can you give an example where a change in IAM policies impacted gateway auth flows?
How do you test these cross-component integrations in CI/CD?

sections.title: Risk Assessment, Trade-offs & Future Planning
sections.goal: Explore the decision-making process for balancing performance, security, and maintainability.
sample_questions: What trade-offs did you consider between blue/green and canary deployments for Orion?
How do you evaluate the blast radius when deploying a new rate limiting policy?
Based on current evidence, what risks should we prioritize in the next quarter?

sections.title: Wrap-up & Reflection
sections.goal: Summarize key learnings and clarify any remaining questions.
sample_questions: What’s one improvement you’d like to see in our deployment process?
How can the PMO better support DevOps in the next project phase?
Any final thoughts on the Orion Edge Gateway build experience?
